title: Dogs with the most Instagram followers worldwide 2017
summary: This is a bar chart representing Month in the x axis and Number of followers in millions in the y axis.
The maximum Number of followers in millions 6.6 is found at Month Jiff Pom @Jiffpom and the minimum is found at Manny @manny the frenchie where Number of followers in millions is 1.0.
There is a difference of 5.6 between the maximum Month Jiff Pom @Jiffpom and minimum Month Manny @manny the frenchie.
min_summary: This bar chart has 10 columns on the x axis representing Month, and Number of followers in millions in each Month on the y axis.
Month Jiff Pom @Jiffpom has the highest Number of followers in millions and Manny @manny the frenchie has the lowest Number of followers in millions.
